title: Google Tensor is partially to blame for MediaTek stealing Qualcomm’s top slot in the US, IDC claims
content:
Qualcomm has long dominated the Android smartphone market, but it seems times are changing. It’s possible that MediaTek has taken the top slot in the US from Qualcomm, and the IDC says that Google Tensor is at least partially to blame for Qualcomm losing its seat.

more…

The post Google Tensor is partially to blame for MediaTek stealing Qualcomm’s top slot in the US, IDC claims appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a respected analyst, Google Tensor is at least partially to blame for Qualcomm possibly losing its top slot to MediaTek in 2021.
